title.rendered: 5 Ways to Stand Out at Virtual Career Fairs

content.rendered:
This school year, there’s a whole new way to find a job or internship: Handshake’s virtual career fairs. There are many reasons why these fairs—which eliminate waiting in long lines on crowded convention floors—are your ticket to getting hired this year. One of the most important, though, is your ability to connect directly with recruiters through both group and one-on-one sessions. But how can you make a good impression and differentiate yourself from other applicants?

Check out the infographic below for five ways to stand out while connecting with recruiters during these virtual fairs. Then, check out our comprehensive list of tips for the days before, of, and after a virtual career fair.
